00019         SketchManager* SketchManager::getInstance()
00020         {
00021             static SketchManager instance;
00022             return &instance;
00023         }

00025         void SketchManager::clear()
00026         {
00027             /* Delete all loaded sketches. */
00028             for(map<string, Sketch*>::iterator iterator = sketches.begin();
00029                     iterator != sketches.end(); iterator++)
00030                 delete iterator->second;
00031             sketches.clear();
00032         }
00033 
00034         Sketch *SketchManager::getSketch(const string &fileName)
00035         {
00036             Sketch *sketch;
00037 
00038             /* Look for the file name in the already loaded sketches. */
00039             map<string, Sketch*>::iterator result = sketches.find(fileName);
00040 
00041             /* Found, restore from memory. */
00042             if(result != sketches.end()) {
00043                 sketch = result->second;
00044 
00045             /* Not found, load. */
00046             } else {
00047                 sketch = new Sketch(fileName);
00048                 sketches[fileName] = sketch;
00049             }
00050 
00051             return sketch;
00052         }
00053     }
00054 }
